layout.feedbackLink: Want to add your language or fix a translation? Open an issue
seasonal.theme.christmas.description: Festive confetti bursts and spreads in Christmas colors
seasonal.theme.koyo.description: Autumn leaves dance and swirl in the wind
seasonal.theme.sakura.description: Cherry blossom petals gently swirl and flutter in the breeze
seasonal.theme.snow.description: Snowflakes softly fall and scatter downward (dark mode recommended)
seasonal.theme.star.description: Gold, silver, and sand shimmer and gently float (dark mode recommended)
